  • 模块
  • 程序包
  • 类
  • 树
  • 索引
  • 帮助

所有类

类
说明
BackgroundSettingController
The class, BackgroundController, is the controller for BackgroundSettingScreen, and is linked with BackgroundSettingScreen.fxml The Background Setting screen contains the radio box to choose from three themes of background: "sea"/li> "mountain" "jungle" The corresponding settings will be transferred to the interactable world
BombItem
The concrete class for bomb item, the bomb item handles all interactions between the hero and the bomb item The class uses strategy design pattern, specified in SpecialItemStrategy package When hero hit a bomb item, the lives value of hero will be deducted by one.
BombStrategy
Concrete Bomb Strategy class
Boss
Class for the boss character at the last level
Bubble
The main.Bubble class handles everything with the main.Hero's special ability, named the bubble.
CeilingUnit
class FloorUnit is the unit for the floor (The ground that hero and enemy can jump on in the air)
CoolDownTimer
The class for cool down timer (cd timer)
DifficultySettingController
The class, DifficultyController, is the controller for DifficultyScreen, and is linked with DifficultySettingScreen.fxml The Difficulty screen contains the radio box to choose from three difficulties: "easy"/li> "medium" "hard" The corresponding settings will be transferred to the interactable world
DynamicComponentFactory
DynamicComponentFactory is the concrete factory of GameCharacter Factory to create Game Character Inside its CreateCharacter method, the method would return corresponding type of character according to attribute 'type'
Enemy
An Enemy is a non-controllable main.GameObject that kills the main.Hero whenever it or its projectile comes in contact.
EnemyProjectile
The EnemyProjectile class handles the specificities with the projectile being shot from an enemy.
FloorUnit
class FloorUnit is the unit for the floor (The ground that hero and enemy can jump on in the air)
FreezeHeroState
Concrete Freeze Hero state class
Fruit
The Fruit class handles how the fruit is created and interacts with the hero.
GameCharacter
Abstract class for game character The game character contains three concrete class: hero enemy boss game character class specifies the generic methods of game character class.
GameCharacterFactory
Abstract class for game character factory, to create specific game character according to type specified in the CreateCharacter(char type, InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum) method.
GameContext
The Context class used to see change in behaviour when Hero State changes.
GameObject
GameObjects are the objects on the InteractableWorld screen.
GameOverScreenController
The class, GameOverController, is the controller for GameOverScreen, and is linked with GameOverScreen.fxml The GameOver screen contains information: GameOver title current score current level And the Game Over screen contains several functionalities and entry: NameInput: input the player game submit: button to submit the player name New Game: back to the original start screen High Score List: view the high score list quit: quit the application The GameOver screen also includes some of the validation because it involves writing data to the file, which means data from user manual input should be checked.
GamePanel
Game panel is where entire game is constantly updated.
GameWinScreenController
The class, GameWinController, is the controller for GameWinScreen, and is linked with GameWinScreen.fxml The GameWin screen contains information: GameWin Title final score And the Game win screen contains several functionalities and entry: NameInput: input the player game submit: button to submit the player name New Game: back to the original start screen High Score List: view the high score list quit: quit the application The win screen also includes some of the validation because it involves writing data to the file, which means data from user manual input should be checked.
Hero
the class of hero, also known as the player.
HeroProjectile
The HeroProjectile class handles the specificities with the projectile being shot from a hero.
HeroState
Interface for hero state hero state contains five concrete state: Normal Hero State Shield Hero State Recover Hero State Stunned Hero State Freezed Hero State
HighScoreFileOperator
The class to read and write high score into the file, as well as sorting the list after the file is generated or updated.
HighScoreListController
The class, HighScoreListController, is the controller for High Score List Screen, and is linked with HighScoreListScreen.fxml The high score list screen contains the information as a table view with two columns and data of: playerName score
IceItem
The concrete class for ice item, the ice item handles all interactions between the hero and the ice item The class uses strategy design pattern, specified in SpecialItemStrategy package When hero hit a ice item, hero's velocity attribute will be altered to a certain extent
IceStrategy
Concrete Ice Strategy class
InfoScreenController
 
InteractableWorld
The interactable world where all static and dynamic component are in, it is the core of the game.
ItemFactory
ItemFactory is the concrete factory of SpecialItem Factory to create special items Inside its CreateItem method, the method would return corresponding type of special item according to String attribute 'type'
Main
The main class to run the application
MedicineItem
The concrete method for medicine item, the medicine item handles all interactions between the hero and the medicine item The class uses strategy design pattern, specified in SpecialItemStrategy package When user hit a medicine item, the lives of the hero will recover by one
MedicineStrategy
Concrete Medicine Strategy class
NormalHeroState
Concrete Normal Hero state class
ProjectileCache
Create a class to get concrete classes from database and store them in a Hashtable.
ProjectileShape
Create an abstract class implementing Clonable interface.
RecoverHeroState
Concrete Recover Hero state class
ShieldHeroState
Concrete Shield Hero State class
SoundEffect
SoundEffect handles the game's SFX.
SoundEffect.Volume
 
SpecialItem
The Abstract SpecialItem is the items on the interactable world where hero can collide with, There are three kinds of special items available in the current game: Bomb item: when hero collide with the bomb item, the live of the hero will be deducted Ice item: when hero collide with the ice item, the hero's X and Y velocity will be decreased Medicine item: when hero collide with the medicine item, the hero's lives will be recover by one
SpecialItemFactory
Abstract class for special item factory, to create specific special item according to type specified in the CreateCharacter(char type, InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum) method.
SpecialItemStrategy
Interface for specialItemStrategy special item strategy contains three concrete strategy: Bomb Strategy: dealing with collision between bomb item and hero Ice Strategy: dealing with collision between ice item and hero Medicine Strategy: dealing with collision between medicine item and hero
StartScreenController
The class, StartScreenController, is the controller for StartScreen, and is linked with StartScreen.fxml The start screen contains the entry to: start: start the game info: the info of the game high score: the high score list entry quit: quit the application The start screen also contains combo box to choose the color of the hero
StaticComponentFactory
StaticComponentFactory is the concrete factory of Unit Factory to create Unit Inside its CreateUnit method, the method would return corresponding type of unit according to attribute 'type'
StrategyContext
Use the StrategyContext to see change in behaviour when it changes its Strategy.
StunnedHeroState
Concrete Stunned Hero state class
Unit
Abstract class for unit The unit abstract class contains three concrete class: Ceiling Unit Floor Unit Wall Unit
UnitFactory
Abstract class for unit factory, to create specific unit according to type specified in the CreateUnit(char type, InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum) method.
User
User class stores the name of the player name, as well as the score for that specific player.
UserHolder
UserHolder class is a class using singleton design pattern to pass the User Setting Class value across the controller.
UserSetting
Class of UserSetting contains all the information before user starts the game, and after the game is set.
WallUnit
class WallUnit is the unit for the wall (The surrounding and the bound of the interactable world)
